name: 1.3.0 in Jetpack

body: - [**External dependency**][**bug**][**wontfix**] Final USSD dialog message showing on top of Splash Screen [#67](https://github.com/romellfudi/VoIpUSSD/issues/67)

name: Release USSD Library 1.1.i Ask Permission Requests
body: - Overlay permissions moves into library and have static methods

name: Release USSD Library 1.1.h Interface for usage
body: - Avoid issues when uses the reference: use USSDApi instead USSDController

name: Release USSD Library 1.1.g Support multi-slot
body: - Release support multiple sim slots & increase minSDK to 23

name: Release USSD Library 1.1.e Support for ITEL devices
body: - Release context instead of activity & support for itel devices

name: Release USSD Library 1.1.d Splash Overlay
body: - Release adding second Overlay using full device screen, don't show any flashing window

name: Release USSD Library 1.1.c Mapping Message
body: - Release using mapping from detect login and error pages

name: Release USSD Android Library 1.1.b
Release upload on Maven Central
Release USSD Android Library 1.0.b

body: Remember import the internal xml into aar or replace with xml similar to ussd_service.xml
